programme.title: The B Side S2
programme.desc: The B Side is back, and it's realer, deeper and more unfiltered than ever. This season, Bianca Gonzalez dives into the untold stories of your favourite artists.

programme.title: Rainbow Rumble (Sun)
programme.desc: Hosted by Luis Manzano, Rainbow Rumble is a trivia game show where five players race to reach the peak of a colour pyramid in a bid to advance to the jackpot round with one million pesos at stake!

programme.title: Darna
programme.desc: Narda, an emergency medical technician and a loving breadwinner to the Custodio family, is destined to become the next protector of the powerful stone that enables her to transform into a superhero who has special abilities to help those in danger.

programme.title: Tulong Ko Pasa Mo
programme.desc: Fill your weekends with joy and inspiration on this public service programme.

programme.title: TVP Sabado
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: TVP Linggo
programme.desc: Comprehensive and incisive, TV Patrol is the benchmark in Philippines news journalism, bringing you the most relevant news delivered by the country's best news anchors.

programme.title: Kapamilya Daily Mass
programme.desc: A daily celebration of the Liturgy of the Lord.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Radyo Patrol Balita
programme.desc: Radyo Patrol Balita focuses on delivering the latest news, breaking events, and important issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gising Pilipinas Live
programme.desc: Spice up your morning with a rousing round-up of the biggest news stories and live reports from field correspondents.

programme.title: Tandem Ng Bayan

programme.title: Magandang Buhay LIVE

programme.title: Huwag Kang Mangamba
programme.desc: Huwag Kang Mangamba

programme.title: Ngayon At Kailanman
programme.desc: Eva fights to reclaim her place in the wealthy Cortes family while searching for the truth about her identity. Fate brings her together with Inno, and their love story endures family secrets, rivalry and tragedy as they discover the real meaning of forgiveness and redemption.

programme.title: Ang Sa Iyo Ay Akin
programme.desc: Marissa and Ellice are best friends who hail from different worlds: Ellice is from an influential family, while Marissa is a simple lass living with her mother Lucing. The two are inseparable until one night, a gruesome crime changes their destinies.

programme.title: BRGY S4
programme.desc: BRGY features interesting and humorous stories about Filipinos and businesses in North America.

programme.title: It's Showtime LIVE

programme.title: Pinoy Crime Stories
programme.desc: The show tackled real-life crimes such as murder, trafficking, and abductions through interviews and dramatizations, offering insight into investigations.

programme.title: Agripreneur
programme.desc: Features the local agriculture industry from practical tips on animal raising and planting to stories of entrepreneurs behind the country's most profitable farms and agricultural spaces.

programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by

programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Afterlife ep 6
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 5
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 10
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING \u0026 DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 11
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Cruz Vs. Cruz
programme.desc: is a story of the two families of Ryan Cruz. He left his original family in the Philippines to work abroad and provide for them. During his time as an OFW, he meets a woman who lures him to marry her after she gets pregnant.

programme.title: Unica Hija
programme.desc: The tragic death of his daughter and the ensuing breakdown of his marriage leads a scientist to clone his daughter, with the hope of bringing his wife back to him. However, others take interest in his daring but morally questionable experiment, leading to his demise. Bianca, the clone, is taken in by an unsuspecting couple, and is raised as their own. Years later, the cloning is discovered. Bianca

programme.title: Hating Kapatid
programme.desc: The series follows twin siblings Tyron and Belle, separated at birth and raised in vastly different worlds. When fate brings them together, their bond sparks a journey of discovery, love, and rivalry-- unaware of the truth that binds them.

programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Mahal Kita, Alam Mo Ba?
programme.desc: In his rush to escape from the policemen, Mario disguised himself as an Arab. At that same moment, Teresa was waiting for the Arab prince she was supposed to marry, whom she has never seen before. In the rush, she thought Mario was her prince and brought him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Magic Kombat
programme.desc: Enter the world of mischief adventures and hilarious experiences in the video game land.

programme.title: Hati Tayo Sa Magdamag
programme.desc: This is a modern tale about woman. Her many moods. Her many faces. No matter who she was, happiness was not destined to be hers as all the events of her past eventually caught up with her.

programme.title: Kung Kasalanan Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Irma was the innocent wife, who was caught in a web of evil spunned by the people she loved. Confused, alone and penniless, she had only Mike to turn to. That is if he would believe her.

programme.title: Ipagpatawad Mo
programme.desc: They were the ideal couple and seemed to lead the perfect life. But their son was not like the other normal children. How they came to terms with the presence of their autistic child in their lives, is the gist of this wonderfully crafted film.

programme.title: Onyok Velasco Story
programme.desc: Born to a family of boxers, Onyok Velasco ate and breathed boxing. The whole nation watched his fight, hoping and praying for Onyok to win the gold. Robbed of the gold or not, Onyok, without doubt, came home victorious.

programme.title: Kool Ka Lang
programme.desc: This is the story of five girls living, loving and eventually fighting it out in the big city.

programme.title: Send In The Clowns
programme.desc: Tito, Vic and Joey play the brothers Roberto, Icardo, and Rodrigo. Tired of getting fired from different odd jobs, they decide to make use of their ability to make people laugh by working as clowns in a carnival.

programme.title: Isang Tanong, Isang Sagot
programme.desc: Jason played the role of a rich and bratty student who fell in love with one of his maids, played by the lovely Donna Cruz. Surprised at the turn of events, he tried to hide his feelings by being unkind to the girl.

programme.title: Sgt. Miguel Carpio: Multiple Murder
programme.desc: An exemplary policeman dedicates so much time to his duties that his wife begins to feel neglected.

programme.title: Humanap Ka Ng Panget (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Andrew E made his acting debut in this wacky comedy based on his big hit \"Humanap Ka ng Panget\". The message of the song is that if you want to be happy it is best to fall in love with an ugly woman or man who will be grateful for your love and will do anything you want.

programme.title: Akin Ang Pangarap Mo
programme.desc: Leo is engaged to Anita out of convenience since her father and her parents are long time friends. It was never an issue, until Leo meets Gigi during his stay in the family farm.

programme.title: Kapantay Ay Langit
programme.desc: Little Charina Scott played Cupid in this romantic comedy about a single mother finding another chance at love.

programme.title: Andres Manambit: Angkan Ng Matatapang
programme.desc: The true story of a law enforcer who did everything he could to uphold the law.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Cara Y Cruz
programme.desc: Berting was an escaped convict. Boggart was a cab driver whom he took hostage when he bolted from jail. The two of them landed in a primitive island where all of the inhabitants were under the control of a religious cult.

programme.title: Grease Gun Brothers
programme.desc: Better known as the Grease Gun Brothers. Ramon (Dante Varona) and his brothers Rodrigo (Rey Malonzo), Romeo (Bembol Roco) and Renato (Roy Flores) play modern-day Robin Hoods to their urban poor community.

programme.title: Paradise Inn
programme.desc: A story about the relationship between a mother and her daughter in a situation where everybody is a snake and with vested interest.

programme.title: Macho Dancer
programme.desc: Pol came to the big city in search of a better life, but instead, he encountered the harsh reality, which would take more than dreams to survive.

programme.title: Extranghero
programme.desc: After causing a series of troubles in his hometown, Botong (Andrew E) leaves for Manila to look for his long-lost mother. But he ends up in a mental asylum where he meets the beautiful Kristy.

programme.title: Kakampi Ko Ang Diyos
programme.desc: A friend entrusted Ronnie with an image of the Infant Jesus. Unknown to him, the image contained papers which would endanger the country.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Nating Hagkan Ang Nakaraan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Helen looks like a woman who has everything anybody could want-a beautiful house, a loving husband, and a baby on the way.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.
